name: Oink Oink!
description:
This is platform roguelike game prototype developed in 4-5 months while  learned to program. It would be apreciated to complety this questionary if you finish or not the game: https://forms.gle/83orAPhEpucoH8K17

In-Game Controles: ASD - To move.     X - To hide.        Spacebar - To jump.

Hope you to enjoy the game!
